targets.expression:
fields event_details.env as env1
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and (event_details.metricType='TTFB' or event_details.metricType='RESOURCE') and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] 
|stats greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncachemiss)) as cachemiss,greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncachehit)) as cachehit,greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncacherefresh)) as cacherefreshhit,(cachehit+cacherefreshhit)/(cachemiss+cachehit+cacherefreshhit) as chr by env1
|display env1,chr

filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and (event_details.initiatorType="navigation" or event_details.initiatorType="script" or event_details.initiatorType="link" ) and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats avg(event_details.compressRate) as compression by event_details.env
|display event_details.env,compression

fields concat(event_details.env,'-',metadata.deviceType) as env
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats count() as deviceCount by env,metadata.deviceType
|display env,deviceCount

panels.title: Page Views by Devices by environment: ${country}

targets.expression:
filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as transferSize by event_details.env
|display event_details.env,transferSize

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and ispresent(event_details.sthcdncachemiss) and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.sthcdnupstreamfblduration,${percentile}) as originFBL by event_details.env
|display event_details.env,originFBL

panels.title: CloudFront to Origin FBL by environment : ${country}

targets.expression:
filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as transferSize, count() as totalRequests by event_details.env 
|display event_details.env,transferSize/totalRequests

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' 
|filter event_details.metricType='RESOURCE' or event_details.metricType='TTFB' 
|filter event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}]  and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncachehit)) as cachehit,greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncacherefresh)) as cacherefreshhit,greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncachemiss)) as cachemiss,(cachehit+cacherefreshhit)/(cachemiss+cachehit+cacherefreshhit) as chr by event_details.initiatorType as behavior,event_details.env
|display behavior,event_details.env,chr
|sort behavior

panels.title: CHR by Content Type by environment: ${country}

targets.expression:
filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='navigation' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats count() as pageViews by metadata.countryCode,event_details.env
|sort metadata.countryCode,pageViews desc

fields metadata.countryCode as countryCode
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='navigation' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] 
|filter countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats count() as pageViews by event_details.sthcdnpop as PoP

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.metricType='TTFB' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats count() as pageViews,pct(event_details.requestTime,${percentile}) as TTFB by metadata.countryCode
|display metadata.countryCode,pageViews,TTFB

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as totalBytes by event_details.sthcdnpop as PoP
|display PoP,totalBytes
|sort totalBytes desc
|limit 10

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}]
|stats count() as totalRequests by event_details.sthcdnpop as PoP
|display PoP,totalRequests
|sort totalBytes desc
|limit 10

fields event_details.env as env
|filter event_details.metricType='TTFB' and env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.connectionTime,${percentile}) as connecttime by env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,env,connecttime

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.metricType='TTFB' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and event_details.metricType='TTFB'
|stats pct(event_details.requestTime,${percentile}) as TTFB by event_details.sthcdnpop as PoP
|display PoP,TTFB
|sort TTFB asc 
|limit 10

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.metricType='TTFB' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] 
|stats pct(event_details.requestTime,${percentile}) as TTFB by event_details.sthcdnpop as PoP
|display PoP,TTFB
|sort TTFB desc
|limit 10

fields event_details.env as env1
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and (event_details.initiatorType='navigation') and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] 
|stats greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncachemiss)) as cachemiss,greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncachehit)) as cachehit, greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncacherefresh)) as cacherefreshhit,(cachehit+cacherefreshhit)/(cachehit+cacherefreshhit+cachemiss) as chr by env1
|display env1,chr

filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and (event_details.initiatorType="navigation") and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats avg(event_details.compressRate) as compression by event_details.env 
|display event_details.env,compression

filter event_details.metricType='FCP'and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.value,${percentile}) as fcp by event_details.metricType,event_details.env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,event_details.env,fcp

filter event_details.metricType='LCP' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.value,${percentile}) as lcp by event_details.metricType,event_details.env,bin(1m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,event_details.env,lcp

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='navigation' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as transferSize, count() as totalRequests by event_details.env
|display event_details.env,transferSize/totalRequests

fields event_details.env as env
|filter event_details.metricType='TTFB' and env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.connectionTime,${percentile}) as connecttime by env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,env,connecttime

fields event_details.env as env
|filter event_details.metricType='TTFB' and env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.value,${percentile}) as ttfb by env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,env,ttfb

fields event_details.env as env1
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and (event_details.initiatorType='img') and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] 
|stats greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncachemiss)) as cachemiss,greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncachehit)) as cachehit,greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncacherefresh)) as cacherefreshhit,(cachehit+cacherefreshhit)/(cachehit+cacherefreshhit+cachemiss) as chr by env1
|display env1,chr

fields event_details.env as env
|filter event_details.initiatorType='img' and env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.requestTime,${percentile}) as ttfb by env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,env,ttfb

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='img' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as transferSize, count() as totalRequests by event_details.env
|display event_details.env,transferSize/totalRequests

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='img' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as transferSize by event_details.env 
|display event_details.env,transferSize

fields event_details.env as env1
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and (event_details.initiatorType='script') and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] 
|stats greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncachemiss)) as cachemiss,greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncachehit)) as cachehit, greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncacherefresh)) as cacherefreshhit,(cachehit+cacherefreshhit)/(cachehit+cacherefreshhit+cachemiss) as chr by env1
|display env1,chr

fields event_details.env as env
|filter (event_details.initiatorType='script' or event_details.initiatorType='other') and env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.requestTime,${percentile}) as ttfb by env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,env,ttfb

|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as transferSize, count() as totalRequests by event_details.env

|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as transferSize by event_details.env
|display event_details.env,transferSize

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and (event_details.initiatorType='script') and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats avg(event_details.compressRate) as compression by event_details.env
|display event_details.env,compression

fields event_details.env as env1
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and (event_details.initiatorType='link') and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] 
|stats greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncachemiss)) as cachemiss,greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncachehit)) as cachehit,greatest(0,count(event_details.sthcdncacherefresh)) as cacherefreshhit,(cachehit+cacherefreshhit)/(cachehit+cachemiss+cacherefreshhit) as chr by env1
|display env1,chr

fields event_details.env as env
|filter event_details.initiatorType='link' and env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats pct(event_details.value,${percentile}) as ttfb by env,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,env,ttfb

|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as transferSize, count() as totalRequests by event_details.env
|display event_details.env,transferSize/totalRequests

filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='link' and event_details.env in [${environment:singlequote}] and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.transferSize) as transferSize by event_details.env
|display event_details.env,transferSize

|stats avg(event_details.compressRate) as compression by event_details.env
